00021 /*! file main.cpp This file contains a command line program to convert a GCOS CEL file to Calvin format. */
00022 
00023 #include "calvin_files/Extractor/src/CmdLine.h"
00024 #include "calvin_files/converters/cel/src/CELFileConverter.h"
00025 //
00026 #include <cstdlib>
00027 #include <cstring>
00028 #include <iostream>
00029 #include <string>
00030 //
00031 
00032 using namespace std;
00033 using namespace affymetrix_cel_converter;
00034 
00035 /*! The input file tag. */
00036 #define INPUT_FILE_ARG "-i"
00037 
00038 /*! The version tag. */
00039 #define VERSION_ARG "-v"
00040 
00041 /*! The help tag. */
00042 #define HELP_ARG "-h"
00043 
00044 /*
00045  * Show a help message.
00046  */
00047 void ShowHelp()
00048 {
00049         cout
00050                 << "Command line arguments:"
00051                 << endl
00052                 << "\t" << INPUT_FILE_ARG << " <the full path of the input GCOS CEL file to convert>"
00053                 << endl
00054                 << "\t" << VERSION_ARG << " <1 = convert to ASCII, 2 = convert to XDA, 3 = convert to Calvin>"
00055                 << endl;
00056 }
00057 
00058 /*
00059  * The options for the converter.
00060  */
00061 typedef struct _ConverterOptions
00062 {
00063         CELFileVersionType version;
00064         string fileName;
00065 
00066 } ConverterOptions;
00067 
00068 /*
00069  * Get the file name from the command line arguments.
00070  * Show the help if required.
00071  */
00072 bool GetOptions(int argc, char **argv, ConverterOptions &options)
00073 {
00074         CCmdLine cmdLine;
00075 
00076         // parse argc,argv 
00077         // no switches were given on the command line, abort
00078         if (cmdLine.SplitLine(argc, argv) < 1)
00079         {
00080                 ShowHelp();
00081                 return false;
00082         }
00083 
00084         // test for the 'help' case
00085         if (cmdLine.HasSwitch(HELP_ARG))
00086         {
00087                 ShowHelp();
00088                 return false;
00089         }
00090 
00091         // get the required argument
00092         try
00093         {
00094                 string str;
00095                 str = cmdLine.GetArgument(INPUT_FILE_ARG, 0);
00096                 options.fileName = str;
00097 
00098                 str = cmdLine.GetArgument(VERSION_ARG, 0);
00099                 options.version = (CELFileVersionType)(atoi(str.c_str()));
00100         }
00101         catch (...)
00102         {
00103                 // one of the required arguments was missing, abort
00104                 ShowHelp();
00105                 return false;
00106         }
00107         return true;
00108 }
00109 
00110 /*
00111  * Extract the information from the Calvin data file and dump it to the command line.
00112  */
00113 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00114 {
00115         // Get the input file name.
00116         ConverterOptions options;
00117         if (GetOptions(argc, argv, options) == false)
00118                 return -1;
00119 
00120         // Test if it is a calvin file.
00121         CELFileConverter converter;
00122         if (converter.ConvertFile(options.fileName.c_str(), options.version) == false)
00123         {
00124                 cout << CELFileConverterErrorMessage(converter.ErrorCode()) << endl;
00125                 return -1;
00126         }
00127         cout << "Conversion complete." << endl;
00128         return 0;
00129 }
